title: Folding of cluster algebras and quantum toroidal algebras
summary: In this paper, we study the relationship between the representation theory of the quantum affine algebra $\mathcal{U}_q(\widehat{\mathfrak{sl}_\infty})$ of infinite rank, and that of the quantum toroidal algebra $\mathcal{U}_q(\mathfrak{sl}_{2n,\mathrm{tor}})$. Using monoidal categorifications due to Hernandez-Leclerc and Nakajima, we establish a cluster-theoretic interpretation of the folding map $φ_{2n}$ of $q$-characters, introduced by Hernandez. To this end, we introduce a notion of foldability for cluster algebras arising from infinite quivers and study a specific case of cluster algebras of type $A_\infty$. Using this interpretation of $φ_{2n}$, we prove a conjecture of Hernandez in new cases. Finally, we study a particular simple $\mathcal{U}_q(\mathfrak{sl}_{2n,\mathrm{tor}})$-module whose $q$-character is not a cluster variable, and conjecture that it is imaginary.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了无限秩量子仿射代数与量子环面代数表示理论的关系，通过范畴化方法建立了q-特征折叠映射的簇代数解释，并证明了Hernandez猜想的新情况。
AI.motivation: 研究无限秩量子仿射代数 $\mathcal{U}_q(\widehat{\mathfrak{sl}_\infty})$ 与量子环面代数 $\mathcal{U}_q(\mathfrak{sl}_{2n,\mathrm{tor}})$ 表示理论之间的关系，理解Hernandez引入的q-特征折叠映射 $φ_{2n}$ 的簇代数结构。
AI.method: 利用Hernandez-Leclerc和Nakajima的幺半范畴化方法，为无限箭图的簇代数引入可折叠性概念，特别研究 $A_\infty$ 型簇代数的特定情况，通过这种簇代数解释来理解折叠映射 $φ_{2n}$。
AI.result: 建立了q-特征折叠映射 $φ_{2n}$ 的簇理论解释，证明了Hernandez猜想的新情况，并研究了一个特殊的 $\mathcal{U}_q(\mathfrak{sl}_{2n,\mathrm{tor}})$-模，其q-特征不是簇变量，推测其为虚模。
AI.conclusion: 通过簇代数框架成功解释了无限秩量子代数与量子环面代数表示理论之间的关系，为理解q-特征折叠映射提供了新的视角，并推进了相关猜想的研究。

title: Compatibility of Drinfeld presentations and $q$-characters for affine Kac--Moody quantum symmetric pairs: quasi-split case
summary: Let $(\mathbf{U}, \mathbf{U}^\imath)$ be a quasi-split affine quantum symmetric pair of type $\mathsf{AIII}$. This case is of particular interest thanks to the existence of geometric realizations and Schur--Weyl dualities. We establish factorization and coproduct formulae for the Drinfeld--Cartan series $\boldsymbolΘ_i(z)$ in the Lu--Pan--Wang--Zhang `new Drinfeld'-style presentation, generalizing the split type results from [Prz23, LP25a]. As an application, we construct a boundary analogue of the $q$-character map, and show that it is compatible with Frenkel and Reshetikhin's original $q$-character homomorphism.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了AIII型拟分裂仿射量子对称对中的Drinfeld-Cartan级数，建立了其分解和余积公式，并构造了边界q-特征映射。
AI.motivation: AIII型拟分裂仿射量子对称对具有几何实现和Schur-Weyl对偶性，这使其成为特别有意义的研究对象。作者希望推广分裂类型的结果，建立更一般的Drinfeld-Cartan级数理论。
AI.method: 采用Lu-Pan-Wang-Zhang的"新Drinfeld"风格表示，建立了Drinfeld-Cartan级数Θ_i(z)的分解公式和余积公式，并构造了边界q-特征映射。
AI.result: 成功推广了分裂类型的结果到拟分裂情况，建立了Drinfeld-Cartan级数的分解和余积公式，构造的边界q-特征映射与Frenkel-Reshetikhin的原始q-特征同态兼容。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为AIII型拟分裂仿射量子对称对建立了系统的Drinfeld-Cartan级数理论，推广了先前分裂类型的结果，并为边界表示理论提供了新的工具。

title: Fusion rules of V_{L_2}^{S_4}
summary: Fusion rules of vertex operator algebra V_{L_2}^{S_4} are determined.

AI.tldr: 本文确定了顶点算子代数 V_{L_2}^{S_4} 的融合规则
AI.motivation: 顶点算子代数的融合规则是表示理论中的重要问题，特别是对于具有对称群作用的顶点算子代数。确定 V_{L_2}^{S_4} 的融合规则有助于理解该代数的表示结构及其在共形场论中的应用。
AI.method: 作者使用了顶点算子代数的表示理论方法，特别是针对具有 S_4 对称群作用的格点顶点算子代数 V_{L_2}。通过分析代数的不可约表示及其张量积结构，推导出融合规则。
AI.result: 成功确定了顶点算子代数 V_{L_2}^{S_4} 的所有融合规则，给出了该代数不可约表示之间的张量积分解公式。
AI.conclusion: 本文完全解决了 V_{L_2}^{S_4} 的融合规则问题，为该类顶点算子代数的表示理论提供了完整描述，为进一步研究相关数学物理问题奠定了基础。

title: Hopf images of coactions and effective symmetry of quantum principal bundles
summary: We introduce Hopf images of coactions of Hopf algebras and develop their role in the geometry of quantum principal bundles. Assuming cosemisimplicity of the structure Hopf algebra, we show that every quantum principal bundle equipped with a right-covariant first-order differential calculus admits a canonical and functorial reduction to one with inner-faithful quantum symmetry. This yields a classification of quantum principal bundles up to effective quantum symmetry and a rigidity result identifying the minimal effective symmetry acting on the reduced total space. Examples from quantum groups are discussed.

AI.tldr: 论文引入Hopf代数的余作用的Hopf像概念，研究其在量子主丛几何中的作用。在结构Hopf代数余半单假设下，证明每个配备右协变一阶微分计算的量子主丛都可规范约化为具有内忠实量子对称性的丛，从而分类量子主丛并识别最小有效对称性。
AI.motivation: 研究量子主丛的几何结构，特别是如何约化量子对称性以获得更简洁的数学描述。通过引入Hopf像概念，旨在建立量子主丛与有效量子对称性之间的对应关系。
AI.method: 引入Hopf代数的余作用的Hopf像概念，在结构Hopf代数余半单的假设下，证明每个配备右协变一阶微分计算的量子主丛都存在规范且函子性的约化，得到具有内忠实量子对称性的量子主丛。
AI.result: 1. 建立了量子主丛到有效量子对称性的约化方法；2. 实现了量子主丛按有效量子对称性的分类；3. 识别了作用在约化全空间上的最小有效对称性；4. 讨论了量子群的具体例子。
AI.conclusion: Hopf像为量子主丛的几何研究提供了有力工具，在余半单性假设下，量子主丛可规范约化为具有内忠实量子对称性的形式，这为量子对称性的分类和最小有效对称性的识别奠定了基础。

title: Averages of Arithmetic Functions over Conductors of Function Fields
summary:
For a finite group $G$ and a sufficiently large (but fixed) prime power $q$ coprime to $G$ we obtain asymptotics for the number of regular Galois extensions $L/ \mathbb{F}_q(t)$, with $\mathrm{Gal}(L/\mathbb{F}_q(t)) \cong G$, ramified at a single place of $\mathbb{F}_q(t)$, thus making progress on a positive characteristic analog of the Boston--Markin conjecture. We also obtain similar results for other arithmetic functions of the product of places of $\mathbb{F}_q(t)$ ramified in $L$, and for more general one-variable function fields over $\mathbb{F}_q$ in place of $\mathbb{F}_q(t)$.
  Some of our proofs make crucial use of a series of recent breakthroughs by Landesman--Levy, as well as a new `vanishing of stable homology in a given direction' result for representations of braid groups arising from braided vector spaces. Other inputs include a study of (rings of coinvariants of) braided vector spaces associated to racks with $2$-cocycles, a connection between convolution of arithmetic functions and direct sums of braided vector spaces, and a Goursat lemma for racks.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了有限域上函数域的单点分歧Galois扩张的渐近计数问题，推广了Boston-Markin猜想在正特征情形下的结果。
AI.motivation: 研究有限域上函数域的Galois扩张计数问题，特别是单点分歧情形，旨在建立正特征版本的Boston-Markin猜想，并推广到更一般的算术函数和函数域。
AI.method: 结合Landesman-Levy的最新突破性成果，利用辫子群表示的稳定同调消失定理，研究带2-上循环的rack相关的辫子向量空间及其环不变量，建立算术函数卷积与辫子向量空间直和之间的联系，并应用rack的Goursat引理。
AI.result: 获得了有限群G在充分大且与G互素的素数幂q下，单点分歧正则Galois扩张L/𝔽_q(t)的渐近计数公式，并推广到分歧点乘积的其他算术函数以及更一般的单变量函数域。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为正特征Boston-Markin猜想提供了重要进展，展示了辫子群表示论和rack理论在函数域Galois扩张计数问题中的有效应用，为相关领域开辟了新方向。

title: Prosummability in Kac--Moody groups
summary: Let $\mathfrak{g}$ be a symmetrizable Kac--Moody algebra. We describe {standard graded} $\mathfrak{g}$-modules $V$, which we use to construct a completion $\widehat{V}$ and pro-unipotent group $\widehat{U}$ in $\GL(\widehat{V})$. These standard graded modules include the adjoint module, all integrable modules, Category~$\mathcal{O}$ modules, and opposite Category~$\mathcal{O}$ modules. We prove that the elements of $\widehat{U}$ are pro-summable series, that is, they are projective limits of summable series on quotients $\widehat{V}/\prod_{j=k}^\infty{V}_j$, for each $k>0$. We give an explicit construction of root subalgebras and their completions, corresponding to every root including the imaginary roots. We also construct complete root groups for imaginary roots, whose elements are also pro-summable series acting on $\widehat{V}$. We show that these groups are isomorphic to groups of power series in variables corresponding to basis elements for the imaginary root space.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究对称化Kac-Moody代数，构建标准分级模及其完备化，证明相关群元素是pro-可和级数，并构造了包括虚根在内的完整根群。
AI.motivation: 研究对称化Kac-Moody代数中标准分级模的完备化结构，构建相应的pro-单幂群，并深入理解包括虚根在内的根子代数和根群的完整结构。
AI.method: 定义标准分级g-模，构造完备化模V̂和pro-单幂群Û⊂GL(V̂)，证明群元素是pro-可和级数，显式构造所有根（包括虚根）的根子代数及其完备化，以及虚根的完整根群。
AI.result: 成功构建了标准分级模的完备化结构，证明了Û中元素是pro-可和级数，给出了所有根（包括虚根）的根子代数和根群的显式构造，并建立了虚根群与幂级数群的同构关系。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为对称化Kac-Moody代数提供了统一的框架来处理标准分级模的完备化，建立了pro-单幂群与pro-可和级数的联系，并完整描述了包括虚根在内的根群结构，为后续研究奠定了基础。

title: Kac--Moody Fibonacci sequences
summary: We summarize known results on how to generate an infinite family of integer sequences from the root lattices of rank 2 Kac--Moody algebras. We compute and tabulate the first twenty entries of a number of these sequences. This provides an overarching framework for a large class of Fibonacci-type integer sequences, evaluations of Chebyshev S and U-polynomials and others.

AI.tldr: 该论文总结了从秩2 Kac-Moody代数的根格生成无限整数序列族的方法，计算并列表展示了多个序列的前20项，为一大类斐波那契型整数序列、切比雪夫S和U多项式求值等提供了统一框架。
AI.motivation: 研究秩2 Kac-Moody代数的根格与整数序列之间的关系，为各种斐波那契型序列和多项式求值提供统一的数学框架，探索代数结构与组合数学之间的深刻联系。
AI.method: 从秩2 Kac-Moody代数的根格生成无限整数序列族，通过系统方法计算这些序列的具体数值，并对多个序列的前20项进行详细计算和列表展示。
AI.result: 成功生成了从秩2 Kac-Moody代数根格导出的无限整数序列族，计算并表格化了多个序列的前20项数值，验证了该框架能够统一包含斐波那契型序列和切比雪夫多项式求值在内的广泛数学对象。
AI.conclusion: 秩2 Kac-Moody代数的根格为生成无限整数序列族提供了强大的数学框架，该框架统一了包括斐波那契型序列和切比雪夫多项式求值在内的多种数学结构，展示了代数几何与组合数学之间的深刻联系。

title: Pauli stabilizer formalism for topological quantum field theories and generalized statistics
summary: Topological quantum field theory (TQFT) provides a unifying framework for describing topological phases of matter and for constructing quantum error-correcting codes, playing a central role across high-energy physics, condensed matter, and quantum information. A central challenge is to formulate topological order on lattices and to extract the properties of topological excitations from microscopic Hamiltonians. In this work, we construct new classes of lattice gauge theories as Pauli stabilizer models, realizing a wide range of TQFTs in general dimensions. We develop a lattice description of extended excitations and systematically determine their generalized statistics. Our main example is the (4+1)D fermionic-loop toric code, obtained by condensing the $e^2m^2$-loop in the (4+1)D $\mathbb{Z}_4$ toric code. We show that the loop excitation exhibits fermionic loop statistics: the 24-step loop-flipping process yields a phase of $-1$. Our Pauli stabilizer models realize all twisted 2-form gauge theories in (4+1)D, the higher-form Dijkgraaf-Witten TQFT classified by $H^5(B^2G,U(1))$. Beyond (4+1)D, the fermionic-loop toric codes form a family of $\mathbb{Z}_2$ topological orders in arbitrary dimensions, realized as explicit Pauli stabilizer codes using $\mathbb{Z}_4$ qudits. Finally, we develop a Pauli-based framework that defines generalized statistics for extended excitations in any dimension, yielding computable lattice unitary processes to detect nontrivial statistics. For example, we propose anyonic membrane statistics in (6+1)D, as well as fermionic membrane and volume statistics in arbitrary dimensions. We construct new families of $\mathbb{Z}_2$ topological orders: the fermionic-membrane toric code and the fermionic-volume toric code. In addition, we demonstrate that $p$-dimensional excitations in $2p+2$ spatial dimensions can support anyonic $p$-brane statistics for only even $p$.

AI.tldr: 该论文构建了新的晶格规范理论作为泡利稳定子模型，实现了广义维度中的拓扑量子场论，重点研究了(4+1)D费米子环拓扑码及其统计性质。
AI.motivation: 拓扑量子场论为描述拓扑物态和构建量子纠错码提供了统一框架，但如何在晶格上表述拓扑序并从微观哈密顿量中提取拓扑激发性质是一个核心挑战。
AI.method: 构建泡利稳定子模型作为晶格规范理论，系统描述扩展激发及其广义统计性质。主要例子是通过凝聚(4+1)D ℤ₄拓扑码中的e²m²环得到的费米子环拓扑码。
AI.result: 实现了(4+1)D中所有扭曲2-形式规范理论（高阶形式Dijkgraaf-Witten TQFT），费米子环拓扑码在任意维度形成ℤ₂拓扑序族，并提出了(6+1)D任意子膜统计等新统计类型。
AI.conclusion: 发展了一个基于泡利的框架来定义任意维度中扩展激发的广义统计性质，构建了新的ℤ₂拓扑序族，包括费米子膜拓扑码和费米子体积拓扑码。

title: Classification of real modules in monoidal categorifications of cluster algebras
summary: In this paper, we propose a conjectural formula for the highest $\ell$-weight monomial of an arbitrary real module over a simply-laced quantum affine algebra. We verify the conjecture under a multiplicative reachability condition, answering the Hernandez--Leclerc classification problem in monoidal categorifications of cluster algebras under this condition. Moreover, we introduce the notion of cluster modules, generalizing Kirillov--Reshetikhin modules and Hernandez--Leclerc modules as special cases. We prove that cluster modules are reachable real modules, and obtain a system of equations governing $q$-characters of the prime cluster modules, providing a natural generalization of both the classical T-system relations for Kirillov--Reshetikhin modules and the exchange relations for Hernandez--Leclerc modules.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一个猜想公式，用于计算单李型量子仿射代数上任意实模的最高ℓ-权单项式，并在乘法可达条件下验证了该猜想，解决了Hernandez-Leclerc分类问题。同时引入了簇模的概念，推广了Kirillov-Reshetikhin模和Hernandez-Leclerc模。
AI.motivation: 研究单李型量子仿射代数上实模的最高ℓ-权单项式，解决Hernandez-Leclerc在簇代数的幺半范畴化中的分类问题，并建立更一般的簇模理论框架。
AI.method: 提出一个猜想公式来描述实模的最高ℓ-权单项式；引入簇模概念，将Kirillov-Reshetikhin模和Hernandez-Leclerc模作为特例；证明簇模是可达实模；推导出控制素簇模q-特征的系统方程。
AI.result: 在乘法可达条件下验证了猜想公式，解决了Hernandez-Leclerc分类问题；建立了簇模理论，证明簇模是可达实模；获得了素簇模q-特征的系统方程，推广了Kirillov-Reshetikhin模的T-系统关系和Hernandez-Leclerc模的交换关系。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功提出了实模最高ℓ-权单项式的猜想公式，并在可达条件下验证了其正确性，解决了重要的分类问题。通过引入簇模概念，统一并推广了现有理论框架，为量子仿射代数的表示理论提供了新的工具和视角。

title: Freidel-Maillet type equations on fused K-matrices over the positive part of $U_q(\widehat{\mathfrak{sl}}_2)$
comment: 19 pages; fixed a few typos; minor changes
summary: The positive part $U_q^+$ of the quantized enveloping algebra $U_q(\widehat{\mathfrak{sl}}_2)$ has a reflection equation presentation of Freidel-Maillet type, due to Baseilhac 2021. This presentation involves a K-matrix of dimension $2 \times 2$. Under an embedding of $U_q^+$ into a $q$-shuffle algebra due to Rosso 1995, this K-matrix can be written in closed form using a PBW basis for $U_q^+$ due to Terwilliger 2019. This PBW basis, together with two PBW bases due to Damiani 1993 and Beck 1994, can be obtain from a uniform approach by Ruan 2025. Following a natural fusion technique, we will construct fused K-matrices of arbitary meaningful dimension in closed form using the uniform approach. We will also show that any pair of these fused K-matrices satisfy Freidel-Maillet type equations.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了量子包络代数U_q^+的反射方程表示，利用q-洗牌代数和PBW基构造了任意维度的融合K-矩阵，并证明了它们满足Freidel-Maillet型方程。
AI.motivation: 研究量子包络代数U_q^+的反射方程表示，特别是如何构造任意维度的K-矩阵，并验证其满足相应的代数方程，这对于理解量子代数的表示理论和相关物理模型具有重要意义。
AI.method: 采用Freidel-Maillet型反射方程表示，利用Rosso的q-洗牌代数嵌入，结合Terwilliger、Damiani和Beck的PBW基（通过Ruan的统一方法获得），采用自然融合技术构造任意维度的融合K-矩阵。
AI.result: 成功构造了任意有意义的维度的融合K-矩阵的闭式表达式，并证明了任意一对这样的融合K-矩阵都满足Freidel-Maillet型方程。
AI.conclusion: 通过统一方法获得了量子代数U_q^+的反射方程表示，建立了任意维度融合K-矩阵的构造理论，为量子代数和相关物理模型的研究提供了新的工具和视角。

title: Cyclic quantum Teichmüller theory
comment: 78 pages, 13 figures. v3: Structure of the paper reorganized. Changed the names of invariants. Other corrections
summary:
Based on the pioneering ideas of Kashaev [Kas98,Kas00], we present a fully explicit construction of a finite-dimensional projective representation of the dotted Ptolemy groupoid when the quantum parameter $q$ is a root of unity, which reproduces the central charge of the $SU(2)$ Wess--Zumino--Witten model. A basic ingredient is the cyclic quantum dilogarithm [FK94].
  A notable contribution of this work is a reinterpretation of the relations among the parameters in the cyclic quantum dilogarithm to ensure its pentagon identity in terms of the mutations of coefficients. In particular, we find the dual roles of these parameters: as coefficients in quantum cluster algebras and as the central characters of quantum cluster variables. We also provide a geometric method to decompose the space of quantum states into irreducible modules of the Chekhov--Fock algebra.
  We introduce two versions of quantum intertwiners associated with a mapping class: on the entire representation space and on each irreducible component, each being an explicit composite of cyclic quantum dilogarithm operators. We prove that the former gives an intertwiner of local representations of quantum Teichmüller space in the sense of Bai--Bonahon--Liu [BBL07], and also coincides with the transpose of the reduced quantum hyperbolic operator of Baseilhac--Benedetti [BB18]. The mutation relation of coefficients is equivalent to the quantum gluing equation. The irreducible intertwiner conjecturally coincides with the Bonahon--Liu intertwiner [BL07], and we give a partial evidence.

AI.tldr: 该论文基于Kashaev的开拓性思想，为点状Ptolemy群构建了有限维射影表示，当量子参数q为单位根时，重现了SU(2) Wess-Zumino-Witten模型的中心荷。核心工具是循环量子双对数函数。
AI.motivation: 研究量子Teichmüller空间和量子双曲几何中的表示理论，特别是当量子参数为单位根时的有限维表示。旨在建立量子簇代数、量子Teichmüller理论和量子双曲几何之间的联系。
AI.method: 使用循环量子双对数函数作为基本工具，重新解释其参数关系以确保五边形恒等式。将参数关系与系数突变联系起来，发现参数在量子簇代数中作为系数和量子簇变量的中心特征的双重角色。引入几何方法将量子态空间分解为Chekhov-Fock代数的不可约模。
AI.result: 构造了两种版本的量子纠缠算子：在整个表示空间上的版本和在每个不可约分量上的版本。证明了前者是量子Teichmüller空间局部表示的纠缠算子，并且与Baseilhac-Benedetti的约化量子双曲算子的转置一致。系数突变关系等价于量子粘合方程。
AI.conclusion: 该工作建立了量子簇代数、量子Teichmüller理论和量子双曲几何之间的深刻联系。不可约纠缠算子推测与Bonahon-Liu纠缠算子一致，并提供了部分证据。这些结果为理解量子参数为单位根时的表示理论提供了新视角。

title: Logarithmic morphisms, tangential basepoints, and little disks
comment: Minor corrections. An error in the proof of Proposition 8.26 was fixed
summary:
We develop the theory of "virtual morphisms" in logarithmic algebraic geometry, introduced by Howell. It allows one to give algebro-geometric meaning to various useful maps of topological spaces that do not correspond to morphisms of (log) schemes in the classical sense, while retaining functoriality of key constructions. In particular, we explain how virtual morphisms provide a natural categorical home for Deligne's theory of tangential basepoints: the latter are simply the virtual morphisms from a point. We also extend Howell's results on the functoriality of Betti and de Rham cohomology.
  Using this framework, we lift the topological operad of little $2$-disks to an operad in log schemes over the integers, whose virtual points are isomorphism classes of stable marked curves of genus zero equipped with a tangential basepoint. The gluing of such curves along marked points is performed using virtual morphisms that transport tangential basepoints around the curves. This builds on Vaintrob's analogous construction for framed little disks, for which the classical notion of morphism in logarithmic geometry sufficed. In this way, we obtain a direct algebro-geometric proof of the formality of the little disks operad, following the strategy envisioned by Beilinson. Furthermore, Bar-Natan's parenthesized braids naturally appear as the fundamental groupoids of our moduli spaces, with all virtual basepoints defined over the integers.

AI.tldr: 本文发展了虚拟态射的对数代数几何理论，为拓扑空间的有用映射提供代数几何意义，并应用于提升小2-圆盘拓扑operad到对数概形上的operad，获得小圆盘operad形式性的直接代数几何证明。
AI.motivation: 为那些在经典意义下不对应于（对数）概形态射的有用拓扑空间映射提供代数几何意义，同时保持关键构造的函子性。特别地，为Deligne的切向基点理论提供自然范畴框架。
AI.method: 发展对数代数几何中的"虚拟态射"理论，扩展Howell的结果。使用此框架将小2-圆盘的拓扑operad提升到整数环上的对数概形operad，其虚拟点对应于配备切向基点的零亏格稳定标记曲线的同构类。
AI.result: 建立了虚拟态射的完整理论，实现了小2-圆盘operad到对数概形operad的提升，获得了小圆盘operad形式性的直接代数几何证明，并发现Bar-Natan的括号化辫子自然作为模空间的基本广群出现。
AI.conclusion: 虚拟态射理论为对数代数几何提供了强大的工具，能够处理经典态射无法涵盖的映射，成功应用于提升拓扑operad到代数几何框架，为小圆盘operad的形式性提供了直接的代数几何证明。

title: Combinatorial bases in quantum toroidal $\mathfrak{gl}_2$ modules
comment: Latex, 30 pages, 12 figures. Misprints corrected, details of the proofs added
summary: We show that many tame modules of the quantum toroidal $\mathfrak{gl}_2$ algebra can be explicitly constructed in a purely combinatorial way using the theory of $q$-characters. The examples include families of evaluation modules obtained from analytic continuation and automorphism twists of Verma modules of the quantum affine $\mathfrak{gl}_2$ algebra. The combinatorial bases in the modules are labeled by colored plane partitions with various properties.

AI.tldr: 该论文展示了如何通过q-字符理论，用纯组合方法显式构造量子环面gl_2代数的许多驯服模，包括从量子仿射gl_2代数的Verma模通过解析延拓和自同构扭曲得到的评估模族。
AI.motivation: 研究量子环面gl_2代数的表示理论，特别是驯服模的显式构造问题。传统方法可能较为复杂，作者希望通过组合方法简化构造过程。
AI.method: 使用q-字符理论，通过纯组合方法构造量子环面gl_2代数的驯服模。具体包括：1）对量子仿射gl_2代数的Verma模进行解析延拓；2）应用自同构扭曲；3）利用组合结构，模块的基由具有各种性质的着色平面划分标记。
AI.result: 成功显式构造了量子环面gl_2代数的许多驯服模，包括从量子仿射gl_2代数的Verma模通过解析延拓和自同构扭曲得到的评估模族。这些模具有组合结构，其基由着色平面划分标记。
AI.conclusion: q-字符理论为量子环面代数的表示构造提供了有效的组合框架，能够显式构造驯服模，并将模块结构与着色平面划分等组合对象联系起来。

title: Geometric Vertex Algebras
comment: 24 pages, 1 figure, content matches published version
summary: Geometric vertex algebras are a simplified version of Huang's geometric vertex operator algebras. We give a self-contained account of the equivalence of geometric vertex algebras with Z-graded vertex algebras.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了几何顶点代数与Z-分级顶点代数的等价性
AI.motivation: 几何顶点代数是黄几何顶点算子代数的简化版本，需要建立其与标准顶点代数理论的等价关系
AI.method: 提供了几何顶点代数与Z-分级顶点代数等价性的自包含证明
AI.result: 成功证明了两种代数结构之间的等价性
AI.conclusion: 几何顶点代数与Z-分级顶点代数在数学上是等价的，为研究顶点代数提供了新的视角

title: $K$-theoretic Coulomb branches of quiver gauge theories and cluster varieties
summary: For $Γ$ a quiver without 1-cycles, we show that the Braverman--Finkelberg--Najakima quantized $K$-theoretic Coulomb branch algebra $\mathscr{A}_Γ$ of the corresponding quiver gauge theory is isomorphic to the quantized universally Laurent algebra (upper cluster $X$-algebra) associated to an explicit initial seed $Π_Γ$. We also show that $Π_Γ$ admits a cluster Donaldson--Thomas transformation as defined by Keller.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了对于没有1-环的箭图Γ，其对应的量子K理论库仑分支代数与某个显式初始种子的量子普遍Laurent代数同构，且该种子具有Keller定义的簇Donaldson-Thomas变换。
AI.motivation: 研究箭图规范理论的量子K理论库仑分支代数与簇代数结构之间的关系，探索不同数学结构之间的对应关系。
AI.method: 通过构造显式初始种子Π_Γ，证明Braverman-Finkelberg-Najakima量子K理论库仑分支代数与量子普遍Laurent代数（上簇X代数）的同构关系。
AI.result: 对于没有1-环的箭图Γ，其量子K理论库仑分支代数与量子普遍Laurent代数同构，且初始种子Π_Γ具有簇Donaldson-Thomas变换。
AI.conclusion: 建立了箭图规范理论的量子K理论库仑分支代数与簇代数理论之间的深刻联系，揭示了这些代数结构的内在统一性。
